page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: RETFORD IS A SMALL MARKET TOWN LOCATED IN BASSETLAW.THE TOWN CENTRE IS USUALLY QUIET BUT ON THURSDAY AND SATURDAY A MARKET IS HELD ON THE TOWN SQUARE. THE MARKET PROVIDES SHOPPERS WITH GOODS THEY MIGHT NOT FIND IN LOCAL SHOPS. THERE ARE PLENTY OF FOOD SHOPS AND FREEZER CENTRES,ALSO THERE ARE MANY BANKS,BUILDING SOCIETIES AND SOLICITORS.MOST PEOPLE WORK AT THE MAIN FACTORIES SUCH AS BRIDON WIRE,NORTHERN RUBBER,PAUL MOODY,{BUDGE AND BABCOCK JENKINS.THERE ARE MANY SCHOOLS WHICH ARE ATTENDED BY THE TOWN CHILDREN AND THE CHILDREN FROM THE SURROUNDING{VILLAGES}.THERE IS A {SPORTS CENTRE}WHICH MANY PEOPLE USE .THE SPORTS CENTRE COVERS MOST SPORTS YOU CAN THINK OF.THERE IS A CINEMA WHICH HAS CLOSED DOWN.
